question: Which of the following is not the work of Abdul Qadir Badauni?
option4: All of them are his works
explanation:
Waqi-at-i-Mushtaqi is the work of Shaikh Rizq Ullah Mushtaqui.

Abdul Qadir Badauni has composed the following -
  1. Tarikh-i-Alfi - a general history compiled at the order of emperor Akbar by Abdul Qadir Badaui and others.
  2. Muntakhab-ul-Tawarikh also called Tarikh-i-Badauni - his most celebrated work. It is a general history of India, from the time of the Ghaznavis down to the fortieth year of Akbarâ€™s reign.
